Articles.Content:
I just completed TF: Revenge of the fallen the game, and there are credits. I thought, thats appropriate.

The thing is, its going over EVERYONE from Europe QA, to localization QA, customer support, Developers, every company that made the game,

there is like a THOUSAND different people. No offence to the developers, but I've been sitting here for 10 minutes still waiting for the credits to end >.< no skip button.

It's called "forcing your players to recognize you".

Also, I am very jealous that you survived the GDDoS.

I didn't survive. You are quite better than me. 193 posts? Peh. I lost 3,000 no joking here.

Oh well.

Also, I know, but I'm never going to remember the names anyway.
